Latest Figures.The latest figure of unemployment available is that for the 25th March, 1929, giving a total number on the registers for Great Britain of 1,132,856. This is a decrease over the position on the 25th February, 1929, amounting to 259,005, but an increase over a year ago of 99,011.ARTHUR STEEL-MAITLAN D.Ministry of Labour,April 11, 1929.
